amendment.description: To improve access to affordable health care.

action.text: Amendment SA 154 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 154 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 48. Record Vote Number: 26.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 154.
Amendment SA 154 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S897-898; text: CR S898) To improve access to affordable health care.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 154 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 100.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 154 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 48. Record Vote Number: 26.
